FuncDef: This command creates or edits a QoS network policy. The network policy defines the treatment that IP or MPLS packets receive as they ingress and egress the network port.

ParaDef.Info: The policy-id uniquely identifies the policy on the router. Values-1 to 65535. ParamDefault: Default- 1
Required parameter when creating a QoS network policy.

A name that is saved as part of the configuration data. If a name is not specified at creation time, then SR OS assigns a string version of the network policy identifier as the name. Values-A string up to 64 characters.

ExtraInfo: Default: network 1 - System Default Network Policy 1
